website_summaries.verdict: This cute and cuddly version of the mighty Chewbacca is adorable, lively, talkative, and the perfect friendly companion for little Star Wars fans.
pros: Chewie roars, groans, snores, and barks when spoken to or touched
cons: Many of Chewie’s sounds are similar if you don’t speak Wookie

website_summaries.verdict: The ultimate interactive Star Wars plush toy. Makes kids feel like Chewie is their personal co-pilot.
pros: Tilts head, raises arms, and roars just like Chewie
Strategic sensors allow him to be tickled
Talks back when spoken to, which makes kids feel like they can speak wookie
cons: Room has to be completely quiet for the talk back feature to work

customer_reviews.title: Scary cool
customer_reviews.text: This is so good it's actually scary. Our daughter loves it, she actually sleeps with it. She thinks it's so awesome that he snores when you put him down. He also replies if you use his name which is awesome. His facial movements make you feel like he's talking to you, which is kind of creepy. The only thing I can compare the way it talks to is that Dinosaur in the Natural Museum of History in London, just much smaller and less scary. Finally, I am forever grateful for the off switch. Thank you for giving this toy an off switch so I don't just have to pray he stops.
customer_reviews.author: Tom F

customer_reviews.title: He's adorable but not sure if mine is defective
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I received a pre-owned Chewie. The box practically fell apart when I opened it, and my Chewie was matted and sticky around his face as if he had hair glue applied. Unfortunately this product is hard to find on shelves so I can't compare to anything else. My husband thinks he's just supposed to look like a hot mess....
customer_reviews.author: R. WeikertTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Eh? It’s okay....
customer_reviews.text: Meh. I’m giving 3 stars for the product creators. Cute concept and design— but left the kids and I severely underwhelmed. He isn’t that loud and his movements and reactions are okay. My dogs really like him and will probably turn him into a very expensive dog toy. Make sure to fine the Velcro opening seam along back-and change out the factory batteries. You also need to turn him to “on”. Also, This is my second one because the touch points werent working...
customer_reviews.author: tee

customer_reviews.title: Positive
customer_reviews.text: I love this little Chewbacca I got it for a Christmas present. I know what it means now I'm Black Friday when I bought it it was $109 Black Friday it was $69 but I really do like it thank you
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Totally delightful toy. Very nicely made.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my spouse, who loves this item. The battery compartment is located in the back. Has a Velcro opening. A bit small though. The switch is located directly above the battery compartment. The operation switch has three (3) positions. When holding Chewie in front of you move switch to the center then press the belly button in front and he speaks, etc. Takes four (4) AA batteries. Chewie comes ready to go with installed temporary batteries, too. A totally delightful toy.
customer_reviews.author: Alaskan Sourdough

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy for kids, big kids and dogs
customer_reviews.text: This guy is not just for kids it's good for us big kids as well, expecially if your a star wars fan. Pros: it moves it's arms and head and looks life like, the microphone reacts at any sound and is a good value if you catch it on sale. As a added bonus it is a fun toy to mess with the dog with as it reacts when the dog barks. Cons:. It says on the box over 100 sounds, it has no where close, it's very repetitive. The voice volume is very low. It comes with batteries but mine were dead so had to immediately change them.
customer_reviews.author: BAM BAM

customer_reviews.title: The cutest robot toy!
customer_reviews.text: Completely adorable robot Chewbacca. He sits with your help, snores, growls, moves his arms, and opens and closes his eyes. Responds to touch and voice, as well as position when laying down...the snoring is fantastic. I’m not sure whether my nephew or I loved him more. The fur has some gel so needs a good brushing after purchasing so it isn’t stiff.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Baby Yoda who??
customer_reviews.text: If you need a toy that does the most amazing high Tec tricks, this one isn’t it. But when I look in his eyes I feel like he’s staring into my soul. He likes to be put to sleep and tickled. He also scored some major mom points by making his Wookiee noises at a completely tolerable sound level. We all love him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Very entertaining!
customer_reviews.text: This Chewie has the most beautiful eyes and looks right at you. He responds to your voice and when you are holding him. Not a ton different movements but a curious child will probably find more! He’s soft but his insides are not. I highly recommend this toy for any aged fans Chewbacca!
customer_reviews.author: EMO

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: This is better than expected. Chewie is so much fun he laughs, hiccups, sings, and can have small conversation. My daughter takes him with us in the car and he shakes his head to the music and raises his arms.... TTTTOOOO cute totally love him thinking about buying a second one so he can have a friend.
customer_reviews.author: marian windham

customer_reviews.title: Surviving a toddler like a champ!
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like about this Chewy? My 3 year old talks to him every day, and drags him about on adventures. Chewy has survived a few months of solid abuse with no issues (just an amusing litany of growls and howls).
customer_reviews.author: Bugawump

customer_reviews.title: CHEWIE!!
customer_reviews.text: I love him, I love him, I love him!!!!!! NO shame in saying I saw New Hope in the theatre....or that I spell theatre with an "re." Chewie’s sound effects are great, his eyes (which move) are a really cool blue, his arms move AND he SNORES !! The ONLY improvement would be if he could WALK like a true walking carpet. I LOVE HIM!
customer_reviews.author: PDX pal m

customer_reviews.title: I am in love!
customer_reviews.text: Husband surprised me with this, knowing my deep love and obsession for Chewy. He is soooo adorable. I was expecting his fur to be a bit softer but once you get the gel off his fur he seemed a lot softer but still a bit scracthy. Works wonderfully and just like shown on the videos when they released him.
customer_reviews.author: Mermaid with human legs

customer_reviews.title: Less fun than a porg.
customer_reviews.text: Its description made me think it was more capable than it is. It simpky doesn't do much, and it os somethingbof a challenge to get it to do amything at all. Also, my son thibks it gas weird eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan F. Koelber

customer_reviews.title: Great figure for any kid
customer_reviews.text: I thought it looked tight. Im not the gift giving type but my niece loves Chewbacca and she absolutely loved this figure. My other niece who is scared of things like this also loved it and she looked a little jealous that she didn't get one. Im very happy with the look on my nieces face.
customer_reviews.author: F.R

customer_reviews.title: Very cool! Just brush his fur!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love Chewie! I read other reviews before purchasing so I knew to expect glue on his fur. It’s described as “hair gel” in the packaging insert and says it will wear off with time or can be brushed out. I opted to brush it out and, aside from an insignificant amount of fur-loss, I haven’t had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: R. Spicer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy unless on sale
customer_reviews.text: Adorable but limited reactions led to tiring of playing with him quickly. His reactions are nearly indistinguishable from each other since they all involve him hollering and raising his arms.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Sheaffer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase and presentation
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy to receive this quality product so soon and it was packaged where I could fully inspect it without removing the original packaging. Awesome deal because I got it to give as a gift
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Best chewy ever
customer_reviews.text: OMG I love this item he’s so much fun to play with I am a 61-year-old adult female and I am having the time of my life with this little character !
customer_reviews.author: Virginia L. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and Entertaining! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Chewie is awesome! His sounds and animations crack me up!! Super soft and possible also. He stands and sits! I have him next to my pc and we chat while I’m gaming! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Christian E. Stark

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Gift of All!!
customer_reviews.text: Our 5 yr old grandson LOVES this! We got it for Christmas & he won’t put it down. It talks, poses & goes to sleep - and it’s’Star Wars’. Doesn’t get any better than that!!
customer_reviews.author: Rhea

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves her Chewie more than me
customer_reviews.text: Ok maybe not more than, but the quality of this is awesome. The fur is awesome. We accidentally discovered that he can burp really well so what’s not to love about a burping Chewie.
customer_reviews.author: Indy Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Turn him off Try Me mode!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old Star Wars fanatic son got this for Christmas. He didn't play with him much initially, but has started getting him out more. At first I thought he wasn't working right, but then realized he was on Try Me mode, so only limited things worked. I think he will enjoy it more now. I got it on a daily deal, don't think I would pay full price for him though.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this at a steep discount and I am having so much fun with it! It reminds me of my old Furby. I have not learned all of the functions yet but Chewie was growling up a storm when I was watching a movie. Good toy for a Star Wars fan.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis E. Lafferty

customer_reviews.title: Great collectible!
customer_reviews.text: I got this afternoon I found out it was more than half off vs Disney store. So I returned other one and purchased this. Came in exactly as described, box in pristine shape. Makes a great collectible for my Star Wars fan.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Valbuena

customer_reviews.title: Birthday Present Success!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nephew for his birthday. He loved it, especially the snoring when Chewie falls asleep and the burping when you squeeze his tummy! Overall a great buy and the price was right (purchased for about $45) I would not have paid the full retail price, but for the discount it was totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: cpukid

customer_reviews.title: may the force be with you
customer_reviews.text: purchased as a gift and was the best gift received by the little guy. he ignored all the other gifts after this one.
customer_reviews.author: chief

customer_reviews.title: Best gift ever for son's fiancee!
customer_reviews.text: This gift was a true winner! I gave this to my son's fiancee for Christmas! They got engaged with Chewbacca present at the new Star Wars Exhibition at Walt Disney World! She was like a 5 year old when she opened this surprise gift and squealed in delight!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Alphin, aka Ginnie Jane Alphin

customer_reviews.title: Real Life Chewie!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this Chewie!! He is fun and responds to your voice!! A great gift for a child or a “big” child like my husband!!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Boudreau

customer_reviews.title: Sons new best friend
customer_reviews.text: Can’t even tell you how much my four year old loves this. It’s a staple every place we go and has become his best friend. Seriously though, highly recommend for any chewy loving child.
customer_reviews.author: Barnabus Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: He’s super cute. Did not snore. Only does same sound and movements. Not totally worth almost 70.00 but a gift for a two year old Star Wars lover it was ok!
customer_reviews.author: Beyond Beauty & More

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy life like
customer_reviews.text: What a great item to gift. If you are a StarWars fan, Or know someone that is, and you gift it or own it, you will be a hit.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: The Actual is Scary
customer_reviews.text: It’s bigger than my dog and the face is ugly. It’s cute in the pics, but actual is scary looking, like the real life chewy. Returning it
customer_reviews.author: Sandy21

customer_reviews.title: So awesome
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and so much fun my husband is a huge Chewbacca fan and he absolutely loves this it seems to be made very well great add to his collection
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Barton

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition
customer_reviews.text: Just love it, it is part of my collection, hit yelled at for buying it, but worth it. Live chewwy.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Guyer

customer_reviews.title: Not that Interactive/Fun
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much does the same thing regardless of the interaction. Not much fun.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo

customer_reviews.title: He’s awesome
customer_reviews.text: For kid or even adult. A true Star Wars fan must have!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler_Berlioz

customer_reviews.title: Good gift idea
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved this! Very cute. Although I wish it were a bit softer so it could be carried around more comfortably. Overall, good quality and I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B

customer_reviews.title: Star wars did it again
customer_reviews.text: My son is in love with this toy he is 10 but actually is still really into these toys perfect for any age I think and it is very cool it talks back and he likes it
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: kinda quiet
customer_reviews.text: kinda quiet but overall not bad. My son (2yrs) loves it, but it is a little underwhelming for the price.
customer_reviews.author: brian Heath

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgic and adorable
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my wife and watched her laugh for hours playing with it. It’s the cutest Furreal Friend toy you can own.
customer_reviews.author: Mikal L

customer_reviews.title: Check out YouTube to see how he interacts Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: adorable, he sheds so don't hug um to tight. My 2 1/2 year old nephew and my Adult cousin were both freaked out by him... but other family members Thought Chewy was freaking the cutest thing
customer_reviews.author: Celeste Resvaloso

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toy for my 4 year old grandon. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Pedro L. San Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my Grandson for Christmas. I know he will love it.
customer_reviews.author: David W. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Kids like it and the toy still works
customer_reviews.text: I got three of these, one each for my older kiddos. They really like the toy and the toy has lasted after 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: oakleytiger

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: work has intended remember to move the switch so it can use the full function like moving its hands. It comes with some hair gel on it don't worry just comb the hair and it goes away.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Neris

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Got it on sale and totally worth it. It's hilarious, soft and super cute. Not sure if I'd pay MSRP for it though.
customer_reviews.author: White1ce

customer_reviews.title: If you love chewy, this is the best one
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and life like. The noises he makes are spot on. His face is so life like. My 9 yr old loves him. Hands down best interactive chewy.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: not
customer_reviews.text: This is not something the little ones can carry around. Very hard body Neither one of my grandchildren would play with it just wasn’t something they can cuddle with
customer_reviews.author: Shirley B

customer_reviews.title: Love Chewie!
customer_reviews.text: I just love this! So much fun. Like having a Wookiee at home to talk to you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cool!
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my brother in law. He’s a Star Wars fan. He was so excited when he opened it for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: A. G.

customer_reviews.title: Great-super-awesome buy
customer_reviews.text: Great-super-awesome buy. My girlfriend loves it and I have played with it many time. Makes you laugh.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel McLuckie

customer_reviews.title: This is the CUTEST THING EVERRRR!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for MYSELF! LOL! I keep it at my desk at the office and it really gives everyone a good chuckle! One of the funniest and most adorable things ever!
customer_reviews.author: Karma Beauty

customer_reviews.title: Kid tested mom approved
customer_reviews.text: Delightful stationary chewy. My dogs look at it like it's crazy but my 5 year old loves it. Chewy goes with us everywhere and she enjoys putting him to sleep (the best quiet time)
customer_reviews.author: tracy

customer_reviews.title: Better than Prozac
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to my ex (F49) and my sister in law (F33) for Christmas, and they love it. Unexpected and fun. Perfect gift for the person who has everything (or doesn’t want for anything, or who you don’t know how to shop for, or whatever). Trust me.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Kind

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect and fun and half the price anywhere I found
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Lora

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Packed brand new! Came fast and in time. My girl loves this toy she takes it with her in the car. Plays With her dolls. It was something I liked and my little girl liked it cause he roars, she also found it funny when he goes to sleep he snores
customer_reviews.author: Jon Shepard

customer_reviews.title: Chewbacca  Buddy
customer_reviews.text: My three year old grandson loves Chewbacca. This is his new best friend.
customer_reviews.author: Zan B

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Great item Bought it as a gift for a friend who loves star wars
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Starting to like it! Soon to love him!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is finally warming up to Chewie, she didn’t like his hair being stiff and said he was too loud.
customer_reviews.author: L. David Strait

customer_reviews.title: Cute little guy!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! Every time we play with him we learn something new to do!
customer_reviews.author: Cherish

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Fun
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for any wookie fan. This thing is pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: VT

customer_reviews.title: Love Chewie!
customer_reviews.text: Chewie was a gift for my daughter’s birthday today. She has played with him for hours. He’s adorable and not nearly as loud as I thought he might be. Great gift!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Good Amazon purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great sale price,shipped quickly,my son will love it,cute as heck,but if you can't stand cookie sounds your in trouble
customer_reviews.author: J.A.Y

customer_reviews.title: perfect gift for the Star Wars lover
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift and was well received. Very cute baby Wookie!
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: neat!
customer_reviews.text: Got as a gift, said he loved it! His dog too!
customer_reviews.author: Faithful

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This was a hit with my grandson, he loved it! It is so lifelike and fun, it’s truly an excellent gift!
customer_reviews.author: Martha Cauthran

customer_reviews.title: Chewbacca
customer_reviews.text: Great chewbacca toy. Wish the volume was a bit louder.
customer_reviews.author: Hugo F Olmedo

customer_reviews.title: Comes with Low Battery
customer_reviews.text: Got it, however, the battery is very low and needs to be changed. Very upsetting.
customer_reviews.author: Azteca

customer_reviews.title: A little Chewbacca makes a big impression
customer_reviews.text: My grown son absolutely loved this. Perfect for any Star Wars fan.
customer_reviews.author: Donna S

customer_reviews.title: It’s awesome
customer_reviews.text: Seriously the coolest toy we’ve bought our son.. he makes a to. Of Wilkie sounds, dances, swings his little arms, he’s super awesome.. highly recommend buying one
customer_reviews.author: dana eidson

customer_reviews.title: Best Chewie Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love him! Better then we thought he was going to be. Our daughter loves him! He’s very interactive when she rocks him in her arms he makes noises. When she lays him down he closes his eyes and starts to snore! Coolest toy we could’ve gotten for her!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my stepson for Christmas. He takes it everywhere and absolutely loves it!

customer_reviews.title: He is adorable
customer_reviews.text: I got this for Christmas for my daughter and she absolutely loved it

customer_reviews.title: this was a gift for my son
customer_reviews.text: my son is a star wars fan. this was really liked.

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for a Star Wars Lover at any age!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Story

customer_reviews.title: I got a bad one.
customer_reviews.text: It doesnt work like it is supposed to. I changed the batteries thinking that was the issue and it didn't make it any better. I am disappointed in the money that was spent on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Harp'smom

customer_reviews.title: He’s interactive
customer_reviews.text: One of the best toys I’ve seen in a long time!

customer_reviews.text: This product is cute ...but a one trick pony. Plus it sheds like crazy....

customer_reviews.text: Chewbacca is hilarious and a fun gift for all ages of star wars fans!

product_meta.title: Star Wars Ultimate Co-pilot Chewie Interactive Plush Toy, brought to life by furReal, 100+ Sound-and-Motion Combinations, Ages 4 and Up
product_meta.description:
Chewbacca (“Chewie” to his best pals) is famous as Han solo’s loyal friend and co-pilot – and now the Star Wars Ultimate co-pilot Chewie interactive plush Toy, Brought to life by the fur Real brand, can be your trusted companion in adventure, wherever your imagination takes you! This amazing animatronic plush friend features 100+ sound-and-motion combinations, responds in the cookies language, and reacts whenever he's in motion – sometimes in surprising ways! 

& tm Lucasfilm Ltd.
furreal and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: The Star Wars Ultimate co-pilot Chewie interactive plush toy, brought to life by the FurReal brand, is the ultimate sidekick for kids who love imagining their own intergalactic adventures
He reacts whenever he’s in motion, and responds in the Wookiee language when he’s spoken to
Including fun facial expressions and arm-raising roars (and occasional snores)
For kids ages 4 and up… and any Star Wars fan

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars514 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
